product_name: Easton Mountain Products Hat Trick 3P Tent - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Providing an excellent space-to-weight ratio, this 4-season tent offers a roomy 3-person interior and color-coded carbon poles for weight savings and super-fast setup in the backcountry.
short_description: Providing an excellent space-to-weight ratio, this 4-season tent offers a roomy 3-person interior and color-coded carbon poles for weight savings and super-fast setup in the backcountry.
